name: Cy's Castle of Doom!
description:
Hello all!  I bear you all welcome to my very first 2d plaformer game, Cy's Castle of Doom!

I am an inspiring indie game developer, and this is my very first game!

Somewhat similar to the good old super mario style of games, I present to you a side scrolling adventure as you control Wade and lead him through a massive castle filled with darkness, traps, various enemies / bosses, on a mission to obtain a couple legendary rings from the evil ghosts called the Cy Twins!

Download the zip file, extract, and double click on the file "Cy's Castle of Doom" to run the game!    Other stuff included is just music :)

If for any reason anyone notices a problem with the game, reach out here and I will address any issues that come up as soon as I can!

Note:  This is a game for PC only.
